scripts.template:checkout:detach: git fetch template react && git checkout template/react
scripts.template:merge: git checkout main && git merge updated_template
scripts.template:recall: npm run template:remote:add && npm run template:checkout:detach && git branch -D main && git switch -c main && npm run template:remote:rm
scripts.template:update: npm run template:remote:add && npm run template:checkout && npm run template:pull && git merge main && npm run template:remote:rm
